title: Calories in Half a Bagel
meta_description: Discover calories in half a bagel, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Plain white bagel, average size (~100 g whole), untoasted, no toppings or spreads.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, flour type, and preparation; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: Half a plain bagel provides ~125 kcal, mostly from carbs with about 4.5 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp cream cheese per half bagel
Whole wheat bagel (vs. white) per half
Toasted with 1 tsp butter per half

faqs.q: How many calories in half a plain bagel?
faqs.a: About 125 kcal for half a standard plain bagel.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in half a bagel?
faqs.a: Roughly 24 g carbs, including 1 g fiber and 2.5 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is half a bagel high in sodium?
faqs.a: It has ~225 mg sodium; choose low-sodium varieties if watching intake.

faqs.q: How does bagel size affect calories?

faqs.q: Are bagels gluten-free options lower calorie?
faqs.a: Gluten-free bagels vary but often similar calories; check labels for exact nutrition.
